page.title: 06ONE DAY AT SCHOOL:WOKINGHAM
page.content: {Phillip's day in school} Today Mr. Sherrin,a Bulmershe college student,came again for the morning.His group wrote their stories: the rest corrected previous work.We discussed a story and thought of ideas.At playtime the boys played football,the girls practiced passing a netball.During the morning we did basic subjects;Maths,Reading and English.At 12.00 the lunch bell went. Children can have a hot meal or their own packed lunch. I had crisps,Cornish pasty and a chocolate wafer.At 1.25 we returned to class and we began our project on Dinton Pastures,a country park.First we drew a map ready for a visit. There has been some trouble,two boys had a fight and Duncan's rude calendar was found and confisacated by our headmaster.At 3.30 my mother met me in the playground and we went home.
